about.title: About Luo City Spa Club
about.subtitle: Relax, Recharge & Rejuvenate by the Manila Bay shoreline

story.heading: Our Story
story.text: Luo City Spa Club was created to be a quiet escape in the middle of the city — a place where professionals, families, and travellers can pause, breathe, and reconnect with themselves. Overlooking the scenic Esplanade Seaside Terminal in the MOA Complex, our spa blends modern wellness with the calming energy of Manila Bay.

philosophy.text: From the moment you arrive, our team is focused on one thing: your comfort. Every treatment, scent, sound and space is thoughtfully designed to help you feel restored, renewed and ready for what comes next.

calm.heading: A Calm Space in the City
calm.text: Soft lighting, warm interiors and attentive service come together to create a sanctuary where you can slow down — even just for a few hours.

facilities.title: Our Facilities
facilities.subtitle: More than just a spa — a complete leisure destination

entertainment.title: Entertainment Area
entertainment.text: Unwind with friends and family in our lively entertainment zone.

private.title: Private VIP Area
private.text: Experience exclusive luxury in our private areas designed for total privacy.

thoughtful.title: Thoughtful Treatments
thoughtful.text: Expert therapists trained in diverse techniques

seaside.title: Seaside Location
seaside.text: Overlooking Manila Bay from MOA Complex

hospitality.title: Warm, Local Hospitality
hospitality.text: Filipino-inspired warmth and attention to detail

commitment.heading: Our Commitment
commitment.text: Luo City Spa Club is committed to providing a clean, safe and relaxing environment for every guest. We follow strict hygiene standards, use trusted spa products, and continuously train our therapists to ensure you receive consistent, quality care.
